filmography.title: 42nd Street
filmography.role_description: A wise-cracking chorus girl known as 'Anytime Annie' who helps the naive lead navigate the tough world of Broadway.
filmography.plot: A producer puts on what may be his final Broadway show, and when the leading lady twists her ankle, a young unknown takes her place.

filmography.title: Gold Diggers of 1933
filmography.role_description: A glamorous showgirl who famously opens the film singing 'We're in the Money' while wearing a costume made of coins.
filmography.plot: Three aspiring actresses battle the Great Depression and try to find work and wealthy husbands in this Busby Berkeley musical.

filmography.title: Flying Down to Rio
filmography.role_description: An assistant bandleader and singer who is paired with Fred Astaire for the first time, stealing the movie with the 'Carioca'.
filmography.plot: A love triangle involving a bandleader, a beautiful Brazilian woman, and his best friend plays out against the backdrop of a hotel opening in Rio.

filmography.title: The Gay Divorcee
filmography.role_description: A woman seeking a divorce who mistakes a dancer for the professional co-respondent hired to help her case.
filmography.plot: A woman thinks a flirting man is the co-respondent her lawyer has hired to expedite her divorce.

filmography.title: Roberta
filmography.role_description: A singer posing as a Polish countess in Paris who reunites with her old bandleader friend from Indiana.
filmography.plot: A football player inherits a Paris fashion house and decides to run it with the help of his bandleader friend.

filmography.title: Top Hat
filmography.role_description: A model who travels to Venice and mistakenly believes the man courting her is her friend's husband.
filmography.plot: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

filmography.title: Follow the Fleet
filmography.role_description: A dance hall hostess who rekindles a romance with her former partner when his ship docks in San Francisco.
filmography.plot: Two sailors on shore leave in San Francisco get mixed up with two sisters, one a singer and the other a plain-jane.

filmography.title: Swing Time
filmography.role_description: A dance instructor who is initially annoyed by a gambler's advances but eventually falls for him on the dance floor.
filmography.plot: A performer and gambler travels to New York City to raise the $25,000 he needs to marry his fiancée, only to become entangled with a beautiful dance instructor.

filmography.title: Shall We Dance
filmography.role_description: A tap dancer who becomes the subject of rumors that she is secretly married to a famous ballet dancer.
filmography.plot: A ballet dancer and a tap dancer fake a marriage for publicity purposes, but eventually fall in love.

filmography.title: Stage Door
filmography.role_description: A cynical, wisecracking dancer living in a boarding house who clashes with a wealthy new roommate.
filmography.plot: A boarding house full of aspiring actresses is thrown into turmoil when a wealthy debutante moves in.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Vivacious Lady
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who impulsively marries a botany professor and must win over his stuffy academic family.
filmography.plot: A botany professor marries a nightclub singer on a whim, then has to break the news to his conservative father and fiancée.

filmography.title: Carefree
filmography.role_description: A singer who goes to a psychiatrist to cure her indecision about marriage, only to fall in love with the doctor.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist tries to help a friend's indecisive fiancée, but she falls for the doctor instead.

filmography.title: The Story of Vernon and Irene Castle
filmography.role_description: A biographical role portraying the famous ballroom dancer who, with her husband, became a global sensation.
filmography.plot: The story of the amateur dancer who rose to fame and fortune with her husband before World War I tragedy struck.

filmography.title: Bachelor Mother
filmography.role_description: A department store clerk who is mistakenly identified as the mother of an abandoned baby and forced to raise him.
filmography.plot: When a woman finds an abandoned baby on the steps of an orphanage, everyone assumes she is the mother.

filmography.title: Fifth Avenue Girl
filmography.role_description: An unemployed woman hired by a lonely millionaire to pose as his gold-digging mistress to annoy his neglectful family.
filmography.plot: A millionaire hires a young woman to pose as his mistress in order to teach his neglected family a lesson.

filmography.title: Primrose Path
filmography.role_description: A young woman from the wrong side of the tracks who tries to hide her family's disreputable past from her new husband.
filmography.plot: A girl from a shanty town marries a respectable man but hides her family's background of prostitution and poverty.

filmography.title: Kitty Foyle
filmography.role_description: A white-collar working girl who reflects on her life and romances while facing a choice between two very different men.
filmography.plot: A salesgirl faces a choice between a steady doctor and a wealthy Philadelphia socialite.

filmography.title: Tom, Dick and Harry
filmography.role_description: An indecisive telephone operator who dreams of marrying a millionaire but finds herself engaged to three different men.
filmography.plot: A telephone operator accepts marriage proposals from three very different men: a go-getter, a millionaire, and a bum.

filmography.title: Roxie Hart
filmography.role_description: A showgirl who confesses to a murder she didn't commit to gain publicity for her career; the basis for the musical 'Chicago'.
filmography.plot: A publicity-hungry showgirl confesses to a murder to boost her career, turning the trial into a media circus.

filmography.title: The Major and the Minor
filmography.role_description: A woman tired of New York who disguises herself as a 12-year-old girl to get a half-fare train ticket home.
filmography.plot: A woman disguises herself as a child to save money on a train ticket and ends up in a compartment with an Army Major.

filmography.title: Once Upon a Honeymoon
filmography.role: Katie O'Hara / Baroness Katherine von Luber
filmography.role_description: An American burlesque performer who marries a Nazi baron, only to be awakened to the truth by a reporter.
filmography.plot: An American radio correspondent tries to rescue a showgirl who has unknowingly married a Nazi official.

filmography.title: Lady in the Dark
filmography.role_description: A successful magazine editor who undergoes psychoanalysis to understand her strange dreams and unhappiness.
filmography.plot: A fashion magazine editor seeks psychiatric help to interpret her bizarre dreams and resolve her romantic conflicts.

filmography.title: I'll Be Seeing You
filmography.role_description: A woman on furlough from prison who falls in love with a shell-shocked soldier during the Christmas holidays.
filmography.plot: A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a woman on Christmas furlough from prison, and they help each other heal.

filmography.title: Week-End at the Waldorf
filmography.role_description: A famous movie star staying at the Waldorf-Astoria who mistakes a war correspondent for a jewel thief.
filmography.plot: Several guests at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel in New York deal with romance, mistaken identities, and business deals.

filmography.title: The Barkleys of Broadway
filmography.role_description: A musical comedy star who wants to take on serious dramatic roles, threatening her partnership with her husband.
filmography.plot: A musical comedy team threatens to break up when the wife decides she wants to be a serious dramatic actress.

filmography.title: Storm Warning
filmography.role_description: A model visiting her sister who witnesses a KKK murder and must decide whether to testify against the Klan.
filmography.plot: A fashion model witnesses a murder committed by the KKK in a small Southern town and discovers her brother-in-law is involved.

filmography.title: Monkey Business
filmography.role_description: The wife of a chemist who accidentally drinks a youth formula, leading to wild, childish behavior.
filmography.plot: A chemist finds his personal and professional life turned upside down when one of his chimpanzees finds the fountain of youth.

filmography.title: Black Widow
filmography.role_description: A sharp-tongued, famous Broadway actress who becomes a suspect when a young writer is found dead.
filmography.plot: A Broadway producer is accused of murdering a young woman he was mentoring, and must find the real killer.
